channel.title: OpenStreetMap on Nicole Siggins
channel.description: Recent content in OpenStreetMap on Nicole Siggins

item.title: HOT Voting Member
item.description: I’ve been a voting member of the Humanitarian OpenStreetMap Team (HOT) since 2022.

item.title: [Upcoming] 2025 State of the Map US - MapSwipe Today and Its Future in OSM
item.description: I’m excited to be presenting at State of the Map US in Boston on June 21, 2025 about MapSwipe and it’s future in OSM.

item.title: [Upcoming] 2025 - State of the Map US - From map gazing to humanitarian action - My journey through OSM and the world of open mapping
item.description: I’m excited to be presenting at State of the Map US in Boston on June 20, 2025 about my mapping journey.

item.title: Continue your mapping contribution - websites to keep you mapping!
item.description: While working at the Humanitarian OpenStreetMap Team I organized and led hundreds of events for corporate employees, introducing them toOpenStreetMap and how to map for humanitarian purposes using the HOT Tasking Manager and MapSwipe4Web.

item.title: 2024 State of the Map US - MapSwipe4Web Launch Party!
item.description: MapSwipe4Web launched officially at State of the Map US 2024, in Salt Lake City, Utah on Friday, June 7th at 2:15PM local time in a Birds of a Feather session.

item.title: 2024 Open Mapping Tech Training - Remote Desktop Mapping on OSM
item.description: Between February and May 2024, there were a series of trainings delivered as part of the Open Mapping Guru Network through the Open Mapping Hub - Asia Pacific.

item.title: 2023 State of the Map Europe - Using OpenStreetMap for Humanitarian Purposes - and introduction to the HOT Tasking Manager
item.description: This 60 minute talk / workshop was an introduction to the HOT Tasking Manager and discussion on it’s current use cases at the 2023 State of the Map Europe in Antwerp, Belgium.

item.title: 2023 State of the Map Europe - Introducing the ohsomeNow stats dashboard - a workshop for measuring your impact
item.description: I co-gave this hour long talk / workshop with Benjamin (Benni) Herfort of the Heidelberg Institute of GeoInformation Technology (HeiGIT) at State of the Map Europe 2023 in Antwerp, Belgium.

item.title: 2021 HOT Data Quality Internship Program - a self study
item.description: I applied for the 2021 HOT Data Quality Internship.

item.title: 2021 London Missing Maps - Making a MapComplete Theme
item.description: MapComplete is a thematic OpenStreetMap viewer and question-based editor with the aim of being really easy to use.
